verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, If a woman <WH802> have conceived seed <WH2232>, and born <WH3205> a man child <WH2145>: then she shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; according to the days <WH3117> of the separation <WH5079> for her infirmity <WH1738> shall she be unclean <WH2930>.
And in the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> shall be circumcised <WH4135>.

And she shall then continue <WH3427> in the blood <WH1818> of her purifying <WH2893> three <WH7969> and thirty <WH7970> days <WH3117>; she shall touch <WH5060> no hallowed <WH6944> thing, nor come <WH935> into the sanctuary <WH4720>, until the days <WH3117> <WH3117> of her purifying <WH2892> be fulfilled <WH4390>.

But if she bear <WH3205> a maid child <WH5347>, then she shall be unclean <WH2930> two weeks <WH7620>, as in her separation <WH5079>: and she shall continue <WH3427> in the blood <WH1818> of her purifying <WH2893> threescore <WH8346> and six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And when the days <WH3117> of her purifying <WH2892> are fulfilled <WH4390>, for a son <WH1121>, or for a daughter <WH1323>, she shall bring <WH935> a lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a burnt offering <WH5930>, and a young <WH1121> pigeon <WH3123>, or a turtledove <WH8449>, for a sin offering <WH2403>, unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, unto the priest <WH3548>: of the first: Heb. a son of his year

Who shall offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and make an atonement <WH3722> for her; and she shall be cleansed <WH2891> from the issue <WH4726> of her blood <WH1818>. This is the law <WH8451> for her that hath born <WH3205> a male <WH2145> or a female <WH5347>.

And if she be not able to bring <WH4672> <WH1767> <WH3027> a lamb <WH7716>, then she shall bring <WH3947> two <WH8147> turtles <WH8449>, or two young <WH1121> pigeons <WH3123>; the one <WH259> for the burnt offering <WH5930>, and the other <WH259> for a sin offering <WH2403>: and the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for her, and she shall be clean <WH2891>. she be: Heb. her hand find not sufficiency of
